Package movement

Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • movement.MoveSet
      • movement.MoveClass
        • movement.Castle
  • public class Castle
extends MoveClass
    A type of moveclass which requires you to move to another piece, then put that piece on the other side of the first piece to protect it.
    Author:
    Alexander

    • Method Detail

      • generateMoves

        public java.util.ArrayList<Move> generateMoves​(Board board,
                                               Piece piece,
                                               boolean getMoves,
                                               boolean getCaptures)
        Get the total list of possible castle points that this castle set can generate. This code makes me want to vomit. It did when I wrote it. It does now.
        Overrides:
        generateMoves in class MoveClass
        Parameters:
        board - The board this piece is on.
        piece - The piece to check.
        getMoves - Whether or not to get moves onto blank squares.
        getCaptures - Whether or not to get moves onto occupied squares which contain an enemy piece, which results in a capture.
        Returns:
        The list of all possible moves on this board from this MoveClass.
